display_long_description:
# 💥 The Rebellion Has Begun! 💥

Suit up, pilot! Fly your heavily armed attack chopper through your living room, as you fight waves of tanks, toy soliders and elite commando teddy bears. Power up your chopper with new guns, missiles and flares as you fight to defeat the evil Bone Mage, his tyranical ally Crystalicus and their toybox army. 

Play using your house as the game level* or on one of our tabletop battle playsets. It's the ultimate casual mixed reality shoot-em' up!

## **What's in the box:**

- 🚁 3 unique copters to unlock and upgrade
- 🎲 Randomized levels - Never the same game twice
- 🎮 Play with touch controllers or a bluetooth gamepad
- 🛋️ Play with or without room scanning
- 🎚️ Adjust the scale of the game depending on your available space
- 🔫 14 destructive weapons plus rare variants
- 🧸 20+ different enemies and bosses to encounter
- 💥 Boatloads of explosions
- 📈 Leaderboards to amaze and impress your friends with your scores


[media]

*Meta Quest 3/3S or higher required
